treatment.file: Mypullorum Mygallinaceum Mygallopavonis Myiowae Mycolumbinsale Mysynoviae Jordan et al 1982
treatment.description: Mycoplasma columbinasale does not ferment glucose, utilizes arginine, does not utilize urea or ferment tetrazolium chloride, shows phosphatase activity, and produces film and spots. G+C content of DNA: 32 mol%. Serologically distinct. Type strain: 694 (= ATCC 33549 = NCTC 10184).
